channel.title: Dry-run on A sea kayak story
channel.description: Recent content in Dry-run on A sea kayak story

item.title: PEI-go-round with Xeon Kayak Ergometer
item.description: This is not the actual trip. This is just training mapped on chart to have an idea of what the real thing might be. March 10, 2023 33 days on ergo, 281 nautical miles, 522 Km, one full lap around PEI Stats Xeon is a heavy-use Kayak Ergometer, that gives a true feel of on-the-water paddling. Xeon ergometer shaft to paddle length The correct way to manage fear is to gradually broaden your comfort zone until your comfort zone includes things that seemed previously impossible.
